{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Nail art {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Nail art Nail art is a creative way to paint, decorate, enhance, and embellish the nails. It is a type of artwork that can be done on fingernails and toenails, usually after manicures or pedicures. Manicures and pedicures are beauty treatments that trim, shape, and polish the nails. Often, these procedures remove the cuticles and soften the skin around the nails. Types of manicures can vary from polish on natural nails to dipping powder and acrylic nails. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nail art)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
